timeline.content:
Hello Matvei , thank you for contacting Amber Student for your accommodation search in London! As the official partner of UCL, we‚Äôre here to ensure you find the perfect place to stay.

I‚Äôm Shikha, and I‚Äôll be guiding you through the process. Please let me know a convenient time to connect so we can move forward with discussing and exploring your preferred accommodation options.

Looking forward to hearing from you!

Thankyou

transcripts.transcript_text:
Speaker A: Call has been forwarded to voicemail. The person you're trying to reach is not available. At the tone, please record your message. When you have finished recording, you may hang up.
Speaker B: Hey, Matvey. This is Shikha from Amber Student and this call is regarding your accommodation. You are searching in London, so let me know your convenient time to connect with you or else you can reach out to me on the same number. Thank you.

Speaker A: Come to Giffgaff's voicemail. The person you're calling can't take your call at the moment. Please leave your message after the tone. To re record your message, press hash at any time.
Speaker B: Hey Matavi, this Aish Shikha from Amber and this call is regarding your accommodation. You are searching in London, so let me know your convenient time to connect with you or else you can reach out to me on WhatsApp. Thank you.
Speaker A: Welcome to Giftgaff's voicemail. The person you're calling can't take your call at the moment. Please.
Speaker A: Your call has been forwarded to voicemail. The person you're trying to reach is not available. At the tone, please record your message. When you have finished recording, you may hang up.
